TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Table extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

public ref class Table : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 在网页上显示表。

span.span: Displays a table on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件允许您生成 HTML 表并以简单方式指定其特征。The control allows you to build an HTML table and specify its characteristics in a straightforward manner. 在设计时，可以在给定一些静态内容的情况下生成一个表，但 当使用动态内容以编程方式生成表时，通常会实现 Web 服务器控件的强大功能。A table can be built at design time given some static content, but the power of a Web server control is often realized when the table is built programmatically with dynamic contents. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` Web.config 文件中元素的属性设置为 `3.5` ，则该控件将 `border` 在 HTML 元素上呈现设置为 "0" 的特性 `table` 。If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the element in the Web.config file is set to `3.5`, the control renders a `border` attribute that is set to "0" on the HTML `table` element. 务必记住，任何编程添加或修改表行或单元将不会在发送到服务器的过程中保持不变。It is important to remember that any programmatic addition or modification of table rows or cells will not persist across posts to the server. 这是因为表行和单元格是其自身的控件，而不是控件的属性 。This is because table rows and cells are controls of their own, and not properties of the control. 若要保持对表的任何更改，必须在每次回发后重建行和单元。To persist any changes to the table, rows and cells must be reconstructed after each postback. 事实上，如果需要进行大量修改，则建议 使用、或 控件而不是 控件。In fact, if substantial modifications are expected, it is recommended that a , , or control be used instead of the control. 因此， 类主要由控件开发人员使用。As a result, the class is primarily used by control developers. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在设计时创建表。The following code example demonstrates how to create a table at design time. 该表包含两个行，分别包含两个单元。The table contains two rows of two cells each. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式构造表。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a table programmatically. 动态创建表包含三个步骤。Creating a table dynamically consists of three steps. 首先，创建 表示行中单元格的对象。First, create objects to represent the cells in a row. 通过设置 属性或通过将控件添加到的集合来添加单元格的内容 。Content for the cells is added by either setting the property or by adding controls to the collection of the . 接下来，创建一个 以表示表中的行。Next, create a to represent a row in the table. 将 之前创建的对象添加到 的集合 。Add the objects created earlier to the collection of the . 最后，将添加 到 控件的集合 。Finally, add the to the collection of the control. 对表中的每一行重复此过程。Repeat this process for each row in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_table_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_table_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_table_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_table_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件的后面显示的背景图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the background image to display behind the control.

value.span: 控件的背景图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件的背景中显示的图像的位置 。Use the property to specify the location of an image to display in the background of the control. 您可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相对 URL 将图像的位置与网页或用户控件的位置相关联，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page or user control without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中，而无需在代码中更新图像的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 绝对 URL 提供完整路径，因此，将站点移到另一个目录需要更新代码。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. > [!NOTE] > 如果图像小于 控件，则将平铺。If the image is smaller than the control, it will be tiled.

related.span: Table、System.windows.documents.tablerow> 和 TableCell Web 服务器控件概述

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示要在 控件的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本 。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control. 指定的文本为辅助技术设备提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的表的说明。The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible. 控件的其他辅助功能支持 由 属性提供。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用 属性指定控件中的 HTML 标题元素的对齐方式 。Use the property to specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in a control. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件中的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置 。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性 。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置标题元素的对齐方式。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|标题元素和表的顶部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|标题元素和表的底部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|标题元素与表的左侧对齐。The caption element is aligned with the left of the table.| |`Right`|Caption 元素与表的右侧对齐。The caption element is aligned with the right of the table.| 控件的其他辅助功能支持 由 属性提供。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用 属性指定要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本 。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 控件的同一列中的所有单元格 都具有相同的宽度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填充量适用于最宽的单元格，列中的所有其他单元格都具有此单元格的宽度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column have this cell width. 同样，同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填充量适用于行中最高的单元格，行中的所有其他单元格都具有此单元格高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row have this cell height. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.

related.span: Table、System.windows.documents.tablerow> 和 TableCell Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Table, TableRow, and TableCell Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.

value.span: 单元格之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制控件中相邻单元格之间的间距 。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the control. 此间距同时应用于垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 单元格间距对于整个表是统一的。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire table. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为大于0的值，并将 属性设置为显示单元格边框的值，则相邻单元格的边框之间将显示一个间隙。If you set this property to a value greater than 0 and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在这种情况下， 属性控制间隔大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员在从控件派生自定义类时使用 。This method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from a control. 此方法重写 基类的实现 。This method overrides the implementation for the base class. 对于 控件， 始终返回一个 ，它只能包含 当前控件的控件 。For a control, the always returns a that can only contain controls of the current control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便它始终返回类的新实例 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_table_createcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_table_createcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_table_createcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_table_createcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件中显示的单元格边框 。Use the property to specify which cell borders are displayed in the control. 下表列出了不同的网格线样式。The following table lists the different grid line styles. |网格线值GridLine value|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |`None`|不显示单元格边框。No cell borders are displayed.| |`Horizontal`|只显示水平单元格边框。Only the horizontal cell borders are displayed.| |`Vertical`|仅显示垂直单元格边框。Only the vertical cell borders are displayed.| |`Both`|显示水平和垂直单元格边框。Both the horizontal and vertical cell borders are displayed.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定网格线样式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the grid line style. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table.GridLines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table.GridLines Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table.GridLines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table.GridLines Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件在页面上的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the control on the page.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 控件在页面内的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the control within the page. 下表列出了不同的水平对齐样式。The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles. |HorizontalAlign 值HorizontalAlign value|说明Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|尚未设置控件的水平对齐方式 。The horizontal alignment of the control has not been set.| |`Left`|控件在页面上左对齐。The control is left justified on the page.| |`Center`|控件在页面上居中。The control is centered on the page.| |`Right`|控件在页面上右对齐。The control is right justified on the page.| |`Justify`|控件与页面的左边距和右边距对齐。The control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAlign/CS/custom_table_aligncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAlign/VB/custom_table_alignvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 控件中行的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of rows in the control.

value.span: ，它包含 控件的 对象。

span.span: A that contains the objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合以编程方式管理 控件中的对象 。Use the collection to programmatically manage the objects in the control. 表示表中的行。A represents a row in the table. > [!NOTE] > 通常仅当以编程方式生成表时才使用此属性。This property is normally used only when building tables programmatically. 在设计时，它通过在控件的 开始和结束标记之间声明对象来设置 。At design time, it is set by declaring objects between the opening and closing tags of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 集合以编程方式构造表。The following example demonstrates how use the collection to construct a table programmatically. 动态创建表包含三个步骤。Creating a table dynamically consists of three steps. 首先，创建 表示行中单元格的对象。First, create objects to represent the cells in a row. 通过设置 属性或通过将控件添加到的集合来添加单元格的内容 。Content for the cells is added by either setting the property or by adding controls to the collection of the . 接下来，创建一个 以表示表中的行。Next, create a to represent a row in the table. 将 之前创建的对象添加到 的集合 。Add the objects created earlier to the collection of the . 最后，将添加 到 控件的集合 。Finally, add the to the collection of the control. 对表中的每一行重复此过程。Repeat this process for each row in the table. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到具有的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an. aspx 扩展。aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 当窗体回发到服务器时，应使用方法引发控件的事件。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event for the control when a form is posted back to the server. 此方法是显式接口成员实现。This method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要为对象定义引发事件的自定义实现 ，请重写 成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 当控件的已发布数据发生更改时，显式接口实现会调用 方法来引发事件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.
